channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Red light out, 1st June
item.description:
Red light on the traffic lights (corner of PE Way and Shakespeare Road, facing towards Banyard Close) currently out (other colours unaffected).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 1st June
item.description:
Ottoman bed and mattress dumped near post box on Marsland Rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Marsland Road, Fiddler's Green, Cheltenham

item.title: Flytipping, 1st June
item.description:
Furniture items dumped outside fence of garden of De Ferriers Walk flats, on the corner of Marsland Road and Hesters Way Rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Marsland Road, Fiddler's Green, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previous repairs failing, 1st June
item.description:
This pothole has been repaired at least twice in recent months but is again failing due to inadequate repairs. It requires another visit to be rectified. Why can't these potholes be fixed properly on the first visit?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 145, Hewlett Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed signs, 1st June
item.description:
The speeding cars and vans along this residential road (Carlton street) could do with reminding to slow down, preferably to 20 miles per hour (speed bumps would be great too). It’s only a matter of time before the regular near misses with cyclists, cars and pedestrians become disastrous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Carlton Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and sinkholes, 1st June
item.description:
These multiple potholes and sinkholes along Carlton street continue to get worse and more dangerous for cars and cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Carlton Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 potholes adjacent to island crossing point westbound A40, 31st May
item.description:
Two potholes worsening and difficult to avoid hitting due to adjacent island.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: Severe damage to road, 30th May
item.description:
Potholes and deep scabbing making driving dangerous and costly. Please can these be fixed. Has already been reported several months ago but nothing been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Lane, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Road falling apart, 30th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Lane, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: 3 or 4 potholes at ingress to and in middle of A40 carriageway at Hearne Road., 30th May
item.description:
These potholes have developed over several weeks. Given that repairs to either side of them on the London road/A40 are imminent, can you please add them to the schedule of works. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, London Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous hole, 30th May
item.description:
The man cover has not been put back properly and it’s too heavy for me to move. There is a gap/hole that someone could potentially get their foot caught in or a small animal could fall down.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Frank Brookes Road, Arle, Cheltenham

item.title: Paint, 30th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Lynworth Place, Whaddon, Cheltenham
